description:
Goku encounters two giant ogres who want nothing more than to use the hero as a play toy! If he can defeat their challenges, the ogres vow to show him the way back to Snake Way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Não toque nisso! A fruta secreta de Enma Sama
Te o Dasuna! Enma-sama no Himitsu no Kudamono
ห้ามแตะต้อง ผลไม้แห่งความลับของท่านเจ้านรก
手を出すな! エンマ様の秘密の果実[くだもの]
